languages.text: "Мне не нужно быть провидцем, чтобы самим естеством своим чувствовать пропитавшую всю вокруг боль".
"I do not need to be a Farseer to feel the pain permeating this place with my very being."
languages.original_text: "Мне не нужно быть провидцем, чтобы самим естеством своим чувствовать пропитавшую всю вокруг боль".

traits.locale_text: "I do not need to be a seer to feel the pain permeating this place with my very being."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I do not need to be a seer to feel the pain permeating this place with my very being."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I do not need to be a seer to feel the pain permeating this place with my very being."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I do not need to be a Farseer to feel the pain permeating this place with my very being."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “就算不踏上先知道途，我也能清楚地感受到这里弥漫的痛苦。”
languages.original_text: "I do not need to be a Farseer to feel the pain permeating this place with my very being."

traits.locale_text: “就算不踏上先知道途，我也能清楚地感受到这里弥漫的痛苦。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「先見司でなくとも、この場所に浸透している痛みを体でヒシヒシと感じられる」
languages.original_text: "I do not need to be a Farseer to feel the pain permeating this place with my very being."

traits.locale_text: 「先見司でなくとも、この場所に浸透している痛みを体でヒシヒシと感じられる」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «No necesito ser vidente para sentir en todo mi ser el dolor que impregna este lugar».
languages.original_text: "I do not need to be a Farseer to feel the pain permeating this place with my very being."

traits.locale_text: «No necesito ser vidente para sentir en todo mi ser el dolor que impregna este lugar».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Je n'ai pas besoin d'être une Grande Prophétesse pour sentir jusque dans ma chair la souffrance qui imprègne ces lieux. »
languages.original_text: "I do not need to be a Farseer to feel the pain permeating this place with my very being."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai pas besoin d'être devin pour sentir jusque dans ma chair la souffrance qui imprègne ces lieux. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ich muss kein Runenprophet sein, um den alles durchdringenden Schmerz hier mit meinem ganzen Wesen zu spüren."
languages.original_text: "I do not need to be a Farseer to feel the pain permeating this place with my very being."

traits.locale_text: "Ich muss kein Seher sein, um den alles durchdringenden Schmerz hier mit meinem ganzen Wesen zu spüren."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Buraya sinen acıyı tüm bedenimde hissetmem için Ötesezen olmama gerek yok."
languages.original_text: "I do not need to be a Farseer to feel the pain permeating this place with my very being."

traits.locale_text: "Buraya sinen acıyı tüm bedenimde hissetmem için Ötesezen olmama gerek yok."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
